The DTN Annual Forum 2025 will be hosted at Institute of Geography and Spatial Planning (IGOT). It is located in the heart of Lisbon city and inside University of Lisbon campus, accessible by several transport modes. For more details on how to [get to Lisbon](/info/gettingToLisbon.html), [to the venue](/info/gettingHere.html) and [around the city](/info/gettingAround.html), check the respective pages.

![](https://www.igot.ulisboa.pt/sites/default/files/styles/imagem_banner_grande/public/images/image_focal_point/2022-09/258-9487dbb71c4495cae503c1c2fc4f2c68.png?h=7097b478&itok=jzGbW0-5)

IGOT has a prominent and consolidated position in geography teaching and researching in Portugal, focusing on areas such as social and earth sciences, planning, spatial planning and management.

Their facilities will host DTN Annual Forum 2025, specifically, the Orlando Ribeiro auditorium.

![Orlando Ribeiro auditorium](https://www.igot.ulisboa.pt/sites/default/files/styles/max_2600x2600/public/images/galeria/2022-06/187-c81f4de150c8b989e1147aa5c57f937d.jpg?itok=Cbuotp8S)
